fields.name: Kilikya Mile End
fields.description:
Welcome to Kilikya Mile End.
Kilikya is a well-established, authentic, Turkish restaurant.
Our chefs offer a range of nuanced cuisine, focussing on; traditional, regional, village and home cooking subtlety.

fields.name: Palmers Restaurant
fields.description: Palmers Restaurant is a stylish yet informal brasserie-style restaurant in Mile End that is a smart spot filled with natural light, bright artworks and smiley staff. Decorated with tiled floors, wooden furniture, floor-to-ceiling windows and plum-coloured banquettes – this dining room has a friendly, linger-over-dessert-and-wine vibe and regulars know the star of the show is the creative modern British menu which is filled with gems such as the queen scallops with slow-roasted pork belly and Madeira sauce; the Bresse Bleu pear and walnut risotto; and the quince and hazelnut crumble with custard. Suitable for working meals and family nights out, Palmers – which is located on Roman Road, has earned an enviable reputation with local food-lovers.

fields.name: Sultan Sofrasi
fields.description:
A traditional taste of Turkey in East London.
With our Charcoal Grill and Stone Bake oven we invite you to try and love our Lahmacun, Balloon (Lavash) bread and variety of grills, soups and salads.

fields.name: The Widow's Son
fields.description: Cosy pub with a legend and heritage details. Kitchen has full menu, classic Burgers with fries are best sellers and there is much more on the menu. Vegetarians and Vegans are also welcome, just mention that when ordering.

fields.name: 90 Degree MELT
fields.description: 90° MELT -American Vegan & Vegetarian Diner. American Vegan & Vegetarian Comfort food, Drinks, Wine and Weekend Brunch

fields.name: Verdi's
fields.description:
Verdi's is a family run authentic Italian restaurant in Stepney Green East London specialising in regional Italian cuisine. 
We are renowned for our pasta dishes using fresh handmade pasta and wood fired oven pizza's .

fields.name: Bacaro
fields.description:
With our roots firmly based in evolved Italian cuisine we also look for inspiration throughout Europe.
Our straightforward modern menu which may change a little each week as our Head Chef Loren is constantly looking to bring new and exciting dishes to our table, is uniquely designed around seasonal produce from carefully selected suppliers and artisan producers across Italy and the UK. Our wines and spirits are selected from small producers chosen either to enhance our dishes or to be appreciated independently. We have a bespoke range of cocktails too!
